00041 const char* sampleXML = 
00042     "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n"
00043     "<RootElement param=\"value\">\n"
00044     "    <FirstElement>\n"
00045     "        Some Text\n"
00046     "    </FirstElement>\n"
00047     "    <SecondElement param2=\"something\" param3=\"something.else 1234-56\">\n"
00048     "        Pre-Text <Inline>Inlined text</Inline> Post-text. <br/>\n"
00049     "    </SecondElement>\n"
00050     "    <prefix:ThirdElement goober:name=\"value\">\n"
00051     "    <!--this is a comment-->\n"
00052     "    <empty_with_space />\n"
00053     "    </prefix:ThirdElement>\n"
00054     "</RootElement>\n"
00055     "<AnotherRoot>The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.</AnotherRoot>\n";

00057 
00058 //
00059 // demo of event handling
00060 //
00061 
00062 
00063 struct PrintAttribute
00064 {
00065     PrintAttribute(ostream& os) : os_(os) {}
00066     ostream& os_;
00067 
00068     void operator()(const pair<string,string>& attribute)
00069     {
00070         os_ << " (" << attribute.first << "," << attribute.second << ")";
00071     }
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 class PrintEventHandler : public Handler
00076 {
00077     public:
00078 
00079     PrintEventHandler(ostream& os)
00080     :   os_(os)
00081     {}
00082 
00083     virtual Status processingInstruction(const string& name,
00084                                          const string& value, 
00085                                          stream_offset position)
00086     {
00087         os_ << "[0x" << hex << position << "] processingInstruction: (" << name << "," << value << ")\n";
00088         return Status::Ok;
00089     };
00090 
00091     virtual Status startElement(const string& name,
00092                                 const Attributes& attributes,
00093                                 stream_offset position)
00094     {
00095         os_ << "[0x" << hex << position << "] startElement: " << name;
00096         for_each(attributes.begin(), attributes.end(), PrintAttribute(os_));
00097         os_ << endl;
00098         return Status::Ok;
00099     };
00100 
00101     virtual Status endElement(const string& name, stream_offset position)
00102     {
00103         os_ << "[0x" << hex << position << "] endElement: " << name << endl;
00104         return Status::Ok;
00105     }
00106 
00107     virtual Status characters(const string& text, stream_offset position)
00108     {
00109         os_ << "[0x" << hex << position << "] text: " << text << endl;
00110         return Status::Ok;
00111     }
00112 
00113     private:
00114     ostream& os_;
00115 };
00116 
00117 
00118 void demo()
00119 {
00120     if (os_)
00121     {
00122         *os_ << "sampleXML:\n" << sampleXML << endl;
00123 
00124         istringstream is(sampleXML);
00125         PrintEventHandler handler(*os_);
00126 
00127         *os_ << "first parse events:\n";
00128         parse(is, handler); 
00129         *os_ << endl;
00130          
00131         *os_ << "second parse events:\n";
00132         parse(is, handler); 
00133         *os_ << endl;
00134     }
00135 }

00138 //
00139 // C++ model of the sample XML
00140 //
00141 
00142 
00143 struct First
00144 {
00145     string text;
00146 };
00147 
00148 
00149 struct Second
00150 {
00151     string param2;
00152     string param3;
00153     vector<string> text; 
00154 };
00155 
00156 
00157 struct Root
00158 {
00159     string param;
00160     First first;
00161     Second second;
00162 };
00163 
00164 
00165 //
00166 //
00167 // Handlers to connect XML to C++ model
00168 //
00169 
00170 
00171 void readAttribute(const Handler::Attributes& attributes, 
00172                    const string& attributeName, 
00173                    string& result)
00174 {
00175     Handler::Attributes::const_iterator it = attributes.find(attributeName);
00176     if (it != attributes.end())
00177         result = it->second;
00178 }
00179 
00180 
00181 class FirstHandler : public Handler
00182 {
00183     public:
00184     
00185     FirstHandler(First& first)
00186     :   object_(first)
00187     {}
00188 
00189     virtual Status characters(const string& text, stream_offset position)
00190     {
00191         unit_assert(position == 0x5e);
00192         object_.text = text;          
00193         return Status::Ok;
00194     }
00195 
00196     virtual Status endElement(const string& name, stream_offset position)
00197     {
00198         unit_assert(position == 0x6c);
00199         return Status::Ok;
00200     }
00201 
00202     private:
00203     First& object_;
00204 };
00205 
00206 
00207 class SecondHandler : public Handler
00208 {
00209     public:
00210 
00211     SecondHandler(Second& object)
00212     :   object_(object)
00213     {}
00214 
00215     virtual Status startElement(const string& name,
00216                                 const Handler::Attributes& attributes, 
00217                                 stream_offset position)
00218     {
00219         if (name == "SecondElement")
00220         {
00221             readAttribute(attributes, "param2", object_.param2);
00222             readAttribute(attributes, "param3", object_.param3);
00223         }
00224            
00225         return Status::Ok;
00226     }
00227 
00228     virtual Status characters(const string& text, stream_offset position)
00229     {
00230         object_.text.push_back(text);          
00231         return Status::Ok;
00232     }
00233 
00234     private:
00235     Second& object_;
00236 };
00237 
00238 
00239 class RootHandler : public Handler
00240 {
00241     public:
00242     
00243     RootHandler(Root& root)
00244     :   object_(root), 
00245         firstHandler_(object_.first),
00246         secondHandler_(object_.second)
00247     {}
00248 
00249     virtual Status startElement(const string& name,
00250                                 const Attributes& attributes, 
00251                                 stream_offset position)
00252     {
00253         if (name == "RootElement")
00254         {
00255             readAttribute(attributes, "param", object_.param);
00256             unit_assert(position == 0x27);
00257         }
00258         else if (name == "FirstElement")
00259         {
00260             // delegate handling to a FirstHandler
00261             unit_assert(position == 0x47);
00262             return Status(Status::Delegate, &firstHandler_); 
00263         }
00264         else if (name == "SecondElement")
00265         {
00266             // delegate handling to a SecondHandler
00267             return Status(Status::Delegate, &secondHandler_);
00268         }
00269 
00270         return Status::Ok;
00271     }
00272 
00273     private:
00274     Root& object_;
00275     FirstHandler firstHandler_;
00276     SecondHandler secondHandler_;
00277 };
00278 
00279 
00280 void test()
00281 {
00282     if (os_) *os_ << "test()\n";
00283 
00284     istringstream is(sampleXML);
00285     Root root;
00286     RootHandler rootHandler(root);
00287     parse(is, rootHandler);
00288 
00289     if (os_)
00290     {
00291         *os_ << "root.param: " << root.param << endl
00292              << "first.text: " << root.first.text << endl
00293              << "second.param2: " << root.second.param2 << endl
00294              << "second.param3: " << root.second.param3 << endl
00295              << "second.text: ";
00296         copy(root.second.text.begin(), root.second.text.end(), ostream_iterator<string>(*os_,"|"));
00297         *os_ << "\n\n"; 
00298     }
00299 
00300     unit_assert(root.param == "value");
00301     unit_assert(root.first.text == "Some Text");
00302     unit_assert(root.second.param2 == "something");
00303     unit_assert(root.second.param3 == "something.else 1234-56");
00304     unit_assert(root.second.text.size() == 3);
00305     unit_assert(root.second.text[0] == "Pre-Text");
00306     unit_assert(root.second.text[1] == "Inlined text");
00307     unit_assert(root.second.text[2] == "Post-text.");
00308 }
00309 
00310 
00311 class AnotherRootHandler : public Handler
00312 {
00313     public:
00314 
00315     virtual Status startElement(const string& name,
00316                                 const Attributes& attributes,
00317                                 stream_offset position)
00318     {
00319         if (name == "AnotherRoot")
00320         {
00321             unit_assert(position == 0x1a6);
00322             return Status::Done; 
00323         }
00324 
00325         return Status::Ok;
00326     }
00327 };
00328 
00329 
00330 void testDone()
00331 {
00332     if (os_) *os_ << "testDone()\n";
00333 
00334     istringstream is(sampleXML);
00335     AnotherRootHandler handler;
00336     parse(is, handler); // parses <RootElement> ... </RootElement>
00337     parse(is, handler); // parses <AnotherRootElement> and aborts
00338     
00339     string buffer;
00340     getline(is, buffer, '<');
00341     
00342     if (os_) *os_ << "buffer: " << buffer << "\n\n";
00343     unit_assert(buffer == "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.");
00344 }
00345 
00346 
00347 void testBadXML()
00348 {
00349     if (os_) *os_ << "testBadXML()\n";
00350 
00351     const char* bad = "<A><B></A></B>";
00352     istringstream is(bad);
00353     Handler handler;
00354 
00355     try 
00356     {
00357         parse(is, handler);
00358     }
00359     catch (exception& e)
00360     {
00361         if (os_) *os_ << e.what() << "\nOK: Parser caught bad XML.\n\n";
00362         return;
00363     }
00364     
00365     throw runtime_error("Parser failed to catch bad XML.");
00366 }

00368 
00369 struct NestedHandler : public SAXParser::Handler
00370 {
00371     int count;
00372     NestedHandler() : count(0) {}
00373 
00374     virtual Status endElement(const string& name, stream_offset position)
00375     {
00376         count++;
00377         return Status::Ok;
00378     }
00379 };
00380 
00381 
00382 void testNested()
00383 {
00384     if (os_) *os_ << "testNested()\n"; 
00385     const char* nested = "<a><a></a></a>";
00386     istringstream is(nested);
00387 
00388     NestedHandler nestedHandler;
00389     parse(is, nestedHandler);
00390     if (os_) *os_ << "count: " << nestedHandler.count << "\n\n";
00391     unit_assert(nestedHandler.count == 2);
00392 }

00394 
00395 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00396 {
00397     try
00398     {
00399         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00400         demo();
00401         test();
00402         testDone();
00403         testBadXML();
00404         testNested();
00405         return 0;
00406     }
00407     catch (exception& e)
00408     {
00409         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00410     }
00411     catch (...)
00412     {
00413         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n"; 
00414     }
00415      
00416     return 1;
00417 }
